name: Blend In (dermotte)
description:
Blend In is a mobile multiplayer game. A hunter tries to find the players, which have to hide and run. Each uses the mobile app with a limited view. Hunters just see distance and directions, others just see the distance to the hunter. Hunters can turn on the flashlights on the mobiles of the players, players in turn can hide. Have Fun!

Blend In is a game by 

  • Veit Frick
  • Alexander Lercher
  • Christoph Wedenig
  • Sarah Wachter
  • Mathias Lux
